item.title: 7 lions to be euthanized at wildlife park: "No real options left"
item.description: The Kamo Wildlife Sanctuary in the northern city of Whangarei said it was closing down and had no choice but to euthanize the big cats.

item.title: Woman held after body of landlord found "severed in two"
item.description: A 39-year-old woman is being held in Switzerland after a body was found "severed in two" in France, Swiss authorities said Wednesday.

item.title: Japan deploys troops in bid to stem surge in deadly bear attacks
item.description: The governor of a northern region of Japan says authorities were getting "desperate" due to a lack of manpower amid daily reports of bear attacks.

item.title: Here's what CBS News exit polls told us about the 2025 elections
item.description: Exit polls in the 2025 races in New Jersey, Virginia, New York City and California showed Trump and the economy were on the minds of voters.

item.title: Supreme Court hears arguments today over Trump's tariffs
item.description: The Supreme Court is hearing arguments over whether a federal emergency powers law authorizes President Trump's most sweeping tariffs.
